item.title: #1 - Alternatives - Every image is provided with a proper alternative text
#2 - Code - The page's source code begins with a Document Type Declaration (DTD) whose syntax is one of those recommended by the W3C
#3 - Code - Each page's content is organised according to a hierarchical heading and sub-heading structure
#4 - Code - The site forces no redirection or automatic refresh on the client side
#5 - Code - Styling is not used to generate content
#6 - Code - Dates are presented in an explicit format
#7 - Contact - The site provides at least one means of contact
#8 - Contact - Mail and phone information about local agencies or headquarters of companies and organisations are provided
#9 - Content - Each page provides a title that enables one to identify its content
#10 - Content - Information in regard to the right to copy and reuse are available from all pages
#11 - Content - Advertisement or sponsored contents are identified as such
#12 - Content - Each page provides a title that enables one to identify the site
#13 - E-commerce - Financing conditions (global credit cost, conditions, reservations, agreement delays) are indicated
#14 - E-commerce - Estimated delivery date is indicated before final order placement
#15 - E-commerce - Sale and use terms and conditions can be reached from every page
#16 - E-commerce - The legal registration number delivered to companies or organisations in their original country is indicated
#17 - E-commerce - The nature and quantifiable characteristics of products and services (dimensions, duration, countenance, etc.) are indicated
#18 - E-commerce - The availability of products is indicated before the final order submission
#19 - E-commerce - Prices displayed show the details of taxes and possible additional costs, as well as the price excluding taxes
#20 - E-commerce - The period and conditions of availability for special offers are indicated
#21 - E-commerce - Modifying each article's quantity, adding and deleting one or more articles is still possible as long as the order has not been definitely placed
#22 - E-commerce - The detailed subtotal (quantities, amount, expenses, insurance, etc.) is indicated before final order placement
#23 - E-commerce - Accepted payment means are indicated, as well as procedures for each of them
#24 - E-commerce - Conditions of guarantee (duration, options, extensions, prices, restrictions, etc.) are indicated
#25 - E-commerce - Customer support service conditions (prices, opening hours, means of contact, etc.) are indicated
#26 - E-commerce - Different shipping and billing addresses can be specified
#27 - E-commerce - Information about zones of product or service delivery are indicated
#28 - E-commerce - No additional product or service is added to the shopping cart without customer action
#29 - Public spaces - The site provides at least one means of contacting the moderator of public spaces
#30 - Files and Multimedia - The length of video and audio contents is indicated
#31 - Files and Multimedia - Sounds and videos are started by the user
#32 - Forms - The creation of a password by the user is validated by a double input
#33 - Files and Multimedia - The format of downloadable files is indicated
#34 - Files and Multimedia - Animations, sounds and blinking can be paused
#35 - Forms - Each form field is associated with its own label in the source code
#36 - Forms - In the case when data entered in a form were rejected, the fields containing the rejected data are indicated to the user
#37 - Forms - Complex processes are provided with a list of steps
#38 - Forms - The current step in a process is indicated
#39 - Forms - The label of each form field indicates if input is mandatory
#40 - Forms - The page displayed after form submission must enable the user to navigate straight away
#41 - Hyperlinks - Each link has a proper label in the source code
#42 - Hyperlinks - Underlining cannot be used for other elements than hyperlinks
#43 - Hyperlinks - Hyperlinks are visually differentiated from the rest of the content
#44 - Identification - The identity of the person or of the service responsible for the contents is provided
#45 - Identification - The site's name and/or the author's name are provided on each page
#46 - Identification - The identity of the author, the company or the organisation is provided
#47 - Identification - The home page explains the nature of contents and services provided
#48 - Identification - If the site is restricted or destined to a specific public, this public is mentioned at least on the home page
#49 - Internationalization - Each page's source code specifies the content's main language
#50 - Internationalization - The country is mentioned in all post addresses
#51 - Internationalization - Each phone number is provided in an international format
#52 - Navigation - The site does not use framesets
#53 - Navigation - Iframes have an explicit title attribute
#54 - Navigation - If all the pages in a site cannot be reached directly from the home page, then a site map can be reached from each page
#55 - Navigation - Each page gives information as to where it is located in the site's hierarchy
#56 - Navigation - It is possible to go back to the home page from any page
#57 - Navigation - The site can be navigated in its entirety using only a keyboard
#58 - Navigation - Keyboard focus is neither removed nor hidden
#59 - Navigation - The user is warned when new windows have to be opened
#60 - Navigation - Navigating the site does not open any popup window
#61 - Navigation - The site does not contain any link to pages under construction
#62 - Navigation - If all the pages in the site cannot be reached through the site map, then an internal search engine can be reached on each page
#63 - Navigation - The site does not resize the browser window
#64 - Newsletter - An 'unsubscribe' link is provided in each newsletter
#65 - Newsletter - The “to” field in a newsletter shows only the recipient's address (or, alternatively, a generic email address created by the sender)
#66 - Newsletter - Subscribing to newsletters is subjected to a prior confirmation process
#67 - Presentation - The design is consistent all over the site
#68 - Security and Privacy - The site provides a way to reinitialise a password if it's lost, stolen or forgotten
#69 - Security and Privacy - Sensitive data are securely transmitted and signalled as such
#70 - Security and Privacy - Sensitive data are not transmitted literally through URLs
#71 - Security and Privacy - Information relative to transaction security are provided
#72 - Security and Privacy - The identity of third-parties involved in transactions is provided
#73 - Security and Privacy - Security certificates are signed and currently valid
#74 - Security and Privacy - The privacy policy can be reached from any page
#75 - Server and performance - Headers sent by the server contain information pertaining to the character set used
#76 - Server and performance - The server sends information to enable the caching of contents
#77 - Server and performance - The address of the site and of its subdomains works with and without a www prefix
#78 - Server and performance - The server sends a personalised 404 Not found error page
#79 - Server and performance - The server sends a 404 HTTP error code for resources not found
#80 - Server and performance - The server compresses contents if the client accepts compressed contents
#81 - Syndication - The source code of syndication feeds indicates their update frequency
#82 - Syndication - Hyperlinks in syndication feeds are absolute
#83 - Syndication - Syndication feeds can be detected by user agents
#84 - Tables - Cells in data tables are linked to their headers
#85 - Alternatives - Information are not conveyed by colour alone
#86 - Alternatives - Embedded objects are provided with a proper alternative
#87 - Alternatives - Audio captchas can be played again at will
#88 - Code - The content does not include nested tables
#89 - Code - The character encoding used is UTF-8
#90 - Code - Text that can be designed through styles is not replaced by images
#91 - Code - Words do not bear any internal space or markup
#92 - Contact - The site provides at least two means of contact
#93 - Contact - Every information request is met with an acknowledgement of receipt
#94 - Contact - Delays for replies to information requests are given
#95 - Content - The site provides users with a way to know about new contents and services
#96 - Content - Cryptic syntaxes (SMS language, ASCII art, etc.) are explained or translated
#97 - Code - Elements which are presented visually as lists are tagged in an appropriate way in the source code
#98 - Code - Navigation blocks are in a consistent place in the source code of all pages
#99 - Code - The content and meaning of each page are not altered when styles are disabled
#100 - Code - Each page's source code contains a metadata defining the character set used
#101 - E-commerce - Any affiliation to a professional association, endorsement of a label or an award features a link to its source
#102 - E-commerce - The way to solve litigations is indicated in the terms and conditions
#103 - E-commerce - Unavailable products are visually and textually differentiated
#104 - E-commerce - The site accepts at least two means of payment
#105 - E-commerce - An email indicating the transaction's reference and the content of the order is sent following order placement
#106 - E-commerce - The transaction reference is shown to the customer after the order has been placed
#107 - E-commerce - Debiting or cashing conditions are specified before final order placement
#108 - E-commerce - Opening hours and prices for all services made available to customers are indicated
#109 - Public spaces - Contents and files destined to public spaces can be checked before final upload
#110 - Public spaces - Conditions of moderation in public spaces are indicated
#111 - Public spaces - Public spaces provide at least one means of reporting abuse
#112 - Files and Multimedia - The text of internal PDF documents can be selected
#113 - Files and Multimedia - The size of files that can be downloaded on the site itself is indicated
#114 - Files and Multimedia - Thumbnails are not bigger images that were resized on the client side
#115 - Forms - In the case when data entered in a form was rejected, the reasons for the rejection are indicated to the user
#116 - Forms - When a form spans several pages, a global summary is displayed before the final form submission
#117 - Forms - In the case when data entered in a form was rejected, all the data entered can be modified by the user
#118 - Forms - The submission of a form is followed by a feedback message indicating if the action worked or not
#119 - Forms - The label of each form field indicates if need be what input format must be used
#120 - Hyperlinks - Hyperlinks of the same nature have identical colours, shapes and behaviours on all pages
#121 - Hyperlinks - Hovering over, or activating, hyperlinks does not alter the layout
#122 - Hyperlinks - The site does not forbid incoming links
#123 - Hyperlinks - All hyperlinks internal to the site are valid
#124 - Hyperlinks - The site applies a different style to unvisited and visited links
#125 - Identification - The site's root contains instructions for spiders and robots
#126 - Identification - The source code for each page contains a metadata describing the page's content
#127 - Identification - The complete address and phone number of companies and organisations can be reached from each page of the site
#128 - Identification - The source code of the pages contains a valid call to a favourite icon (“favicon”)
#129 - Internationalization - The main language of a link's target page is provided if it differs from the original page
#130 - Internationalization - Each page provides a link to available translations
#131 - Navigation - Navigation icons are provided with an explicit legend
#132 - Navigation - Each page provides “skip links” at the beginning of its source code
#133 - Navigation - The search result page indicates the number of results, the number of pages of results, and the number of results per page
#134 - Navigation - Keyboard navigation happens in an foreseeable order
#135 - Navigation - New windows that are resized, as well as modal windows, are provided with an explicit close button
#136 - Navigation - Navigation blocks of the same nature are in a consistent place on every page
#137 - Navigation - Links to an external software have an explicit label
#138 - Navigation - If the site is not restricted to a specific public, content is available immediately
#139 - Navigation - A content that must be read by a screen reader is not hidden from it
#140 - Presentation - The site provides at least one print stylesheet
#141 - Presentation - A generic font family is listed as the last alternative in font family lists
#142 - Presentation - The display font size is set in variable units and not in fixed units
#143 - Security and Privacy - The server does not list files in folders that do not have index files
#144 - Security and Privacy - The aim of using cookies, as well as the consequences of refusing them, are explained
#145 - Security and Privacy - Accounts and subscriptions opened online can be closed online
#146 - Server and performance - The server sends the main language of contents as a header
#147 - Tables - Captions for data tables are provided
#148 - Security and Privacy - Passwords can be chosen and changed by the user
#149 - Security and Privacy - The process of accessing and modifying personal data is explained
#150 - Server and performance - The server sends a personalised 403 Not allowed error page
#151 - Syndication - The site provides at least one link to each syndication feed
#152 - Tables - Linearising tables used for layout does not impede the understanding of contents
#153 - Tables - Data tables are not simulated through styled text
#201 - Newsletter - The frequency of newsletters can be found before subscribing
#154 - Alternatives - An alternative way is provided wherever captchas are used
#155 - Alternatives - Every audio or video content is provided with a text transcript
#156 - Code - Inline styles are used in an appropriate way
#157 - Code - The page's source code includes no error in either the tree of the document or the syntax of tags and attributes
#158 - Code - Each page's source code does not contain any presentational tag or attribute
#159 - Code - Real dimensions of images are indicated in the source code
#160 - Code - The first occurrence of an abbreviation or of an acronym in the content of any page gives access to its meaning
#161 - Code - Contents and services are available even if scripts are disabled
#162 - Code - The page's source code is valid according to the chosen grammar
#163 - Code - Quotations are tagged in an appropriate way in the source code
#164 - Code - Each page's source code contains no element that was misused for presentational purposes
#165 - Contact - The data contained in the site's WHOIS information make it possible to get to the owner directly
#166 - Content - Graphical symbols are HTML images and not unicode characters
#167 - Content - A lexicon or a glossary adapted to the target audience explains the professional or technical vocabulary
#168 - Content - The content of each page of a site contains no spelling mistake
#169 - Content - If the site provides a personal space (or a subscriber space), it is possible to backup personal data in a standard format
#170 - Content - A metadata indicates the reference URL for contents provided in several forms
#171 - E-commerce - The site provides at least one means of contacting the person to whom complaints can be placed
#172 - E-commerce - Refunding conditions (delays, expenses and vouchers needed) are indicated
#173 - E-commerce - The address and the conditions for returns (on site, to workshops) are indicated
#174 - E-commerce - Each complaint is met with an acknowledgement of receipt
#175 - E-commerce - The way to file complaints and the way they are processed are indicated
#176 - Public space - Information destined to public spaces can be previewed in their final presentation
#177 - Files and Multimedia - Running animations does not block access to navigation or content
#178 - Files and Multimedia - An information link is provided for each plugin necessary to access the content
#179 - Files and Multimedia - Internal PDF documents are tagged
#180 - Forms - Form validation on the client side is also done on the server side
#181 - Forms - The user is told when a form input is case-sensitive
#182 - Forms - Each form label is visually linked to the form field it describes
#183 - Forms - Form fields that require a common information are grouped under a single legend
#184 - Forms - Elements of a drop-down list that can be grouped are indeed grouped in a proper way
#185 - Forms - Option lists in forms are presented in an understandable order
#186 - Hyperlinks - Consecutive hyperlinks are separated visually
#187 - Hyperlinks - Each hyperlink's label describes either its function or the nature of its target
#188 - Hyperlinks - Internal and external hyperlinks are differentiated
#189 - Identification - The extension used is coherent with the identity, the activity, the geographical zone or with the domain name
#190 - Identification - If the site claims to abide to on or more standards and guidelines, a link is provided to each of them
#191 - Identification - The site provides a sitemap file listing contents to be crawled
#192 - Internationalization - Links to equivalent versions of a page or site are written in the target language
#193 - Internationalization - Each language change is signalled
#194 - Internationalization - Links to translated versions directly target the current page's translation
#195 - Internationalization - The language of downloadable files is mentioned if it is not the same as the original page
#196 - Internationalization - The content's text direction is indicated when it differs from default
#197 - Navigation - Navigating the site does not forcefully open any new window
#198 - Newsletter - It is possible to unsubscribe from newsletters from the site
#199 - Newsletter - The publication date and/or the issue number of the newsletter are indicated in the subject of messages
#200 - Newsletter - The latest newsletter sent is available online
#202 - Newsletter - Newsletter archives are available online
#203 - Presentation - The amount of different fonts used on the site is less than or equal to three (except when showing works or graphic products)
#204 - Presentation - Contents are presented with a sufficient contrast with their background
#205 - Presentation - The content of each page can be printed without navigation blocks
#206 - Presentation - The site provides one or more style sheets for mobile browsers
#207 - Presentation - Sentences or groups of words in text images are not cut up in several images
#208 - Presentation - A content is not mentioned only in reference to its shape or to its position on the screen
#209 - Presentation - Text content can still be read when text is increased twice in the browser
#210 - Presentation - Capitalisation of words for decorative purposes is achieved through styling
#211 - Security and Privacy - A mechanism raises the user's awareness regarding their password's level of security
#212 - Server and performance - The server respects the preferential order of languages specified in user agents
#213 - Server and performance - Calls to external scripts are put after the content
#214 - Server and performance - The main navigation menu is featured on personalised error pages
#215 - Server and performance - Script functions are put into external files
#216 - Server and performance - Scripts are minified
#217 - Server and performance - Style information are minified
